english.segment1: His strength is perfect. So perfect
english.segment2: I can do all things through Christ who gives me strength. But sometimes I wonder what he can do for me. No great success to show. No glory of my own. yet in my weakness he is there to let me know
english.segment3: (chorus). His strength is perfect when our strength is gone. He'll carry us when we can't carry on. Raised in his power the weak becomes strong. His strength is perfect. His strength is perfect
english.segment4: We can only know the power that he holds. When we truly see how deep our weakness goes. His strength it must begin. When ours comes to an end. He hears our humble cry and proves again
